Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.5 Savitakkaduka » 13.5.1 Paṭiccavāra
13.5.1.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Piṭṭhiduka
Savitakkaduka
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
108.
4301Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, naanantare tīṇi…pe…  nakamme cattāri, navipāke nava, nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyā tīṇi, novigate tīṇi.
<< Suddhaup13.5.1.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
